subject: YOUR US$41.5 MILLION HAS BE
body:
YOUR US$41.5 MILLION HAS BEEN WIRED TODAY TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT.
Attention please,  Dear Good Friend,
THIS IS TO INFORM YOU WE HAVE FINALLY RECEIVED THE CLEARANCE TO WIRE YOUR APPROVED US$41.5 MILLION TO YOUR BANK.YOUR US$41.5 MILLION WAS WIRED THIS FEW HOURS AGO TO THE BANK ACCOUNT YOU PROVIDED AS CONTAIN IN YOUR PAYMENT FILE SENT TO US FROM THE FINANCIAL SERVICES AUTHORITY (FSA).
PLEASE NOTE THAT YOUR US$41.5 MILLION WAS WIRED TO THE BANK ACCOUNT BELLOW:
HSBC BANK HONG KONG
EASTERN COMMERCIAL CENTER 395 HENNESSY ROAD HONG KONG
ACCOUNT NO: 3001826970
SWIFT CODE: HSBCHKHHHKH
PLEASE SEND ME A CONFIRMATION MESSAGE AS SOON AS YOU RECEIVE THE WIRED FUND IN YOUR BANK ACCOUNT BY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON LAST WEEK.
CONGRATULATIONS ONCE AGAIN,  WE ARE SORRY FOR THE DELAY IN THE PAYMENT AND TRANSFER OF YOUR US$41.5 MILLION TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT AT THE BEGINNING OF 2016, IT WAS DUE GOVERNMENT REGULATIONS.
Your Full Name
 Your Contact Address
 Your Direct telephone. Fax Number ( if any)
 Your AGE and what you do for a living
 How Many Months Or Years in which You Have Been Expecting
 your Payment
 The Place you sent Money Last whether Nigeria or London etc
 The Last Amount of Money You sent indicating What Month and
 Year
 WAITING TO HEAR FROM YOU TODAY.
 YOURS FAITHFULLY,
DR MARSH DAVID

subject: Re:    YOUR US$41.5 MILLION HAS BE
body:
Hello Dr. Marsh David,

Wow, this is such exciting news! I can't believe my US million has been wired to my bank account. I'm just a simple person and never thought something like this would happen to me.

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind. You mentioned that the money was wired to HSBC Bank in Hong Kong, but I don't recall providing any information about an account there. Could you please clarify how the funds ended up there?

Also, you mentioned that the Financial Services Authority (FSA) sent my payment file to you. Could you tell me more about what this file contains? And why did the government cause a delay in the payment and transfer of my US million?

I'm sorry for all these questions, but as I said earlier, I'm just a simple person and all of this is quite new to me.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Ronald

subject: ATTENTION MY GOOD FRIEND, MR RONALD / AWAITS YOUR URGENT REPLY AND MAKE SURE RECONFIRM TO YOUR FULL INFORMATION TO ENABLE US PROCEED TO START PROCESSINGYOUR APPROVED SUM OF $41.5M DOLLARS INTO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT ON BEFORE NEXT WEEKEND.
body:
Attention, Mr Ronald

Thanks for your awaited reply  to stand firmly to  reclaim your approved
sum of $41.5m Dollars which Mr Johnson Lee came to our office and tendered
documents that he is your next of kin the on the process we transfer your
approved sum of $41.5m Dollars into  HSBC Bank in Hong Kong then after we
found out that he was fake and scammer immediately we placed tracer and the
transferred $41.5m Dollars was returned bank immediately  and government
urgently declared Mr Johnson Lee wanted as security agent are on alert to
arrest him at all cost as well government directed me to contact over your
approved sum of $41.5m Dollars is is with us  and it is ready to be
transfer in due cause into your bank account. on before next weekend.

FOR YOUR INFORMATION THERE IS NEED FOR  YOU TO BE FOCUS , SINCERE AND
HONEST THAT THIS TRANSACTION  ISTAND TO BE LONG TO YOU AS ONE MAN THAT CAME
TO OUR OFFICE AND TENDERED SOME DOCUMENTS THEN THAT HE WAS YOUR NEXT OF
KIN  THEN YOUR APPROVED SUM OF $30.5M DOLLARS  INTO HIS TENDERED BANK
ACCOUNT ONLY FOR US TO UNDERSTAND HE WAS A SCAMMER THEN WE PLACED TRACER
IMMEDIATELY AND YOUR APPROVED SUM OF $30.5M DOLLARS TO OUR OFFICE  AS
GOVERNMENT DIRECTED ME TO CONTACT TO   YOU IMMEDIATELY SO THAT YOU RECLAIM
YOUR FUNDS AS I WILL SUPPORT YOU BY GUIDING YOU AND PROVIDE  VITAL AND
CLASSIFIED DOCUMENTS TO  BACK UP OF RELEASING YOUR PAYMENT TO YOU SO GO
AHEAD TO RECONFIRM TO US YOUR FULL INFORMATION AND CHOOSE ONE THE PAYMENT
OPTIONS  AS FOLLOWS BELOW.

TERMS OF PAYMENT AS FOLLOWS WHICH YOU MUST CHOOSE ONE THIS OPTIONS
IMMEDIATELY.

1, BANK TO BANK TRANSFER / ONLINE BANKING ACCOUNT.

2, THROUGH CASH PAYMENT DIRECTLY TO YOUR  COUNTRY VIA COURIER AS
CONSIGNMENT THAT IS TO TRAVEL TO NETHERLANDS / HOLLAND

3, THROUGH CREDITED ATM CARD  TO ENABLE YOU CASHING AT LEAST THE SUM THE OF
$250,000 DOLLARS PER DAY FROM ANY BANK AROUND YOU OR AROUND THE
WORLD..

4, TO TRAVEL TO ONE OF R OUR OUTLET OFFICES SUCH AS CANADA, NETHERLANDS
HOLLAND.

Your Full Name
 Your Contact Address
 Your Direct telephone. Fax Number ( if any)
 Your AGE and what you do for a living
 How Many Months Or Years in which You Have Been Expecting
 your Payment
 The Place you sent Money Last whether Nigeria or London etc

 WAITING TO HEAR FROM YOU TODAY.

Thanks for your Cooperation
Sincerely,
DR MARSH DAVID

subject: Re: ATTENTION MY GOOD FRIEND, MR RONALD / AWAITS YOUR URGENT REPLY AND MAKE SURE RECONFIRM TO YOUR FULL INFORMATION TO ENABLE US PROCEED TO START PROCESSINGYOUR APPROVED SUM OF $41.5M DOLLARS INTO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT ON BEFORE NEXT WEEKEND.
body:
Hello Dr. Marsh David,

Thank you for your message and the detailed information. I'm sorry to hear about the situation with Mr. Johnson Lee, it sounds like a complicated matter.

I'm glad to know that my approved sum of dollars is safe and ready to be transferred. However, I would like to understand more about the process before making any decisions.

Could you please explain more about each payment option? For example, how does the bank-to-bank transfer work? And what are the steps involved in online banking account transfer?

Also, could you provide more details about the cash payment directly via courier? How secure is this method? And what do you mean by "traveling to Holland"?

The ATM card option also sounds interesting. Could you tell me more about how it works and its benefits?

Lastly, traveling to one of your outlet offices seems like an exciting opportunity. What would be required from me if I choose this option?

I appreciate your patience in answering these questions as I want to make sure I fully understand all options before making a decision.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ronald

subject: Re: ATTENTION MY GOOD FRIEND, MR RONALD / AWAITS YOUR URGENT REPLY AND MAKE SURE RECONFIRM TO YOUR FULL INFORMATION TO ENABLE US PROCEED TO START PROCESSINGYOUR APPROVED SUM OF $41.5M DOLLARS INTO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT ON BEFORE NEXT WEEKEND.
body:
Hello Dr. Marsh David,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing such detailed information about the situation. I must say, it's quite a surprise to hear about Mr. Johnson Lee's actions. I'm glad that your team was able to catch this in time.

I am interested in reclaiming my approved sum of dollars, as you mentioned. However, before we proceed, could you please clarify a few things for me? 

Firstly, how did Mr. Johnson Lee manage to present himself as my next of kin? It's quite alarming that he had access to such personal information.

Secondly, could you provide more details about the process of transferring the funds back from HSBC Bank in Hong Kong? How was it possible to trace and return the money?

Lastly, regarding the payment options you've listed - could you explain them a bit more? For instance, what does "bank to bank transfer online banking account" entail exactly? And how would "cash payment directly to your country via courier" work?

I appreciate your patience with my questions and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ronald
